nodes.bodyText:
I'm not sure about this. We have co-worker(s) working on Windows as well AFAIK.
@pihme does the current sed implementation of this newBenchmark script work on your machine?
It does work. I have to use WSL (Windows Subsystem for Linux) anyway, and it registers properly as Linux i that mode.
@pihme ok, so the change here would also still work on WSL?
